description: This is a Flutter Dart source file defining a Dashboard screen with placeholder content and an internal widget for info cards.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the dashboard view with a scrollable list of informational cards.

classes.name: _InfoCard
classes.description: A private stateless widget that displays a titled card with a subtitle, styled according to the current theme.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for DashboardScreen, including a CustomScrollView with header and list of info cards.

methods.name: _InfoCard.build
methods.description: Builds a Card widget displaying a title and subtitle styled with theme data.
